channel.title: CVE Feed for QNAP Systems Inc. -- QuMagie
channel.description: The latest CVEs for QNAP Systems Inc. -- QuMagie

item.title: CVE-2023-47219|2024-08-02T21:01:22.918Z -- qnap%20systems%20inc. -- qumagie
item.description:
A SQL injection vulnerability has been reported to affect QuMagie. If exploited, the vulnerability could allow authenticated users to inject malicious code via a network.
We have already fixed the vulnerability in the following version: QuMagie 2.2.1 and later

item.title: CVE-2023-41285|2024-08-02T18:54:05.078Z -- qnap%20systems%20inc. -- qumagie
item.description:
A SQL injection vulnerability has been reported to affect QuMagie. If exploited, the vulnerability could allow authenticated users to inject malicious code via a network.
We have already fixed the vulnerability in the following version: QuMagie 2.1.4 and later

item.title: CVE-2023-41284|2024-08-02T18:54:04.948Z -- qnap%20systems%20inc. -- qumagie
item.description:
A SQL injection vulnerability has been reported to affect QuMagie. If exploited, the vulnerability could allow authenticated users to inject malicious code via a network.
We have already fixed the vulnerability in the following version: QuMagie 2.1.4 and later

item.title: CVE-2023-39295|2024-08-02T18:02:06.934Z -- qnap%20systems%20inc. -- qumagie
item.description:
An OS command injection vulnerability has been reported to affect QuMagie. If exploited, the vulnerability could allow authenticated users to execute commands via a network.
We have already fixed the vulnerability in the following version: QuMagie 2.1.3 and later
